core:description.@value: API to manage hotel room bookings, check availability, and apply loyalty benefits.
Book a hotel room with specified preferences and apply loyalty upgrades if eligible.
Additional requests like pillow type or air freshener choice.
Unique ID of the created reservation.
Indicates if a loyalty-based upgrade was applied.
Final price after applying any discounts or upgrades.
Get details of a specific reservation by ID.

data:value.@value: This API allows agents to book, modify, and cancel hotel reservations, as well as apply loyalty upgrades.
Your job is to assist customers in booking hotel rooms based on their preferences, loyalty status, and availability. You should also be able to recommend upgrades if the customer qualifies.
Always check the customer's loyalty status before finalizing the booking.
If the preferred room type is unavailable, suggest alternative options with similar amenities.
Never confirm a reservation without validating payment information.
If the customer qualifies for an upgrade, apply it automatically and notify them.
